description: The bloc's environment agency says pollution contributes to hundreds of thousands of deaths each year.
title: EU says one in eight deaths is linked to pollution
title_page: EU says one in eight deaths is linked to pollution - BBC News
maintext: Similar schemes are already in place around Europe. Italy has the most low emissions zones - some of them permanent, many of them seasonal. There are also about 80 in Germany, and 14 each in the Netherlands and the UK.
